fr.sorbonne_u.components.pubsub.interfaces

Interface Subscription


  • public interface Subscription
    The PubSub must keep track of the subscribers that it needs to notify at each publication, hence the Subscription interface is just an abstraction of a subscriber.

    Note that this interface role is totally different from the SubscriberService interface role. This interface will be used by the PubSub to keep track of the subscribers, i.e for each subscription there will be a required out-bound port (Observer.Required) to notify a subscriber, not only that, but also to update the subscription's filter. However the SubscriberService interface role defines the required services that a subscriber can perform, such as subscribe or unsubscribe.

    See Also:
    Observer, SubscriberService, PubSubOutBoundPort
